critique:
This document is an executive order opening tax returns to the Special Committee on Un-American Activities. This committee was created to investigate suspected disloyalty and subversive activities. 

Ideological Tilt: The committee was formed to investigate "Un-American Activities", which is a vague term that could be used to target individuals or groups with differing political views. This leans conservative. Initial score: -2. Revised score: -2.

National Security vs. Civil Liberties: The document prioritizes national security by allowing the Special Committee on Un-American Activities access to tax returns. This could potentially infringe on civil liberties. Initial score: 3. Revised score: 3.
